name: window minimize
description: Minimizes an application window. If a title is provided, the first matching window is minimized; otherwise the currently active window is minimized.

title.description: Substring (case-insensitive) of the window title to match. If omitted, the active window is used.

exact.description: If true, match the title exactly; otherwise use substring matching (default: false).

index.description: If multiple windows match, select by zero-based index (default: 0).

status.description: 'success' if the window was minimized, 'error' otherwise.

matched_title.description: Title of the window that was minimized (present on success).
